Settings.Name: Banker
Settings.Summary: Will put the Darkmoon Cards into bank if True.

While.Condition: MailCount >= 1 || HasNewMail || InbagCount (61979) >= 2 || InbagCount (61980) >= 2 || InbagCount (61978) >= 10 || (InbagCount (61981) + (InbagCount (61978) / 10) >= 10) || InbagCount (52985) >= 5 || InbagCount (52988) >= 5 || InbagCount (52983) >= 5 || InbagCount (52987) >= 5 || InbagCount (52986) >= 5 || InbagCount (52984) >= 5

If.Condition: InbagCount (61979) < 2 && InbagCount (61980) < 2 && InbagCount (61978) < 10 && (InbagCount (61981) + (InbagCount (61978) / 10) < 10) && InbagCount (52985) < 5 && InbagCount (52988) < 5 && InbagCount (52983) < 5 && InbagCount (52987) < 5 && InbagCount (52986) < 5 && InbagCount (52984) < 5
InbagCount (52985) >= 5 || InbagCount (52988) >= 5 || InbagCount (52983) >= 5 || InbagCount (52987) >= 5 || InbagCount (52986) >= 5 || InbagCount (52984) >= 5

CustomAction.Code: Log("Going to trade Blackfallow Inks for Inferno Inks.");
Log("I don't have enough Volatile Life, picking some up from mailbox.");

Comment.Text: With this profile you need the addon "Postal"
Set Postal up to stop gathering mail at 2 bag spots like this:
2. Press the "Down Arrow" next to the "X" upper right corner.
OpenAll -> Other Options -> Keep Free Space -> 2
